"Story Quest Difficulty":
"About Story Quest Difficulty

Here, you can choose the difficulty level of the Story Quest. The difficulty you choose does not affect the story.

\"Casual\"
Enemies' level is lowered, making the quest easier to complete. Recommended if you just want to follow the story.

\"Hardcore\"
Enemies' level is a bit higher, and bosses become challenging. More difficult to clear, but some Titles can only be earned on this difficulty."
